## Checklist
- [ ] I have GIMP 3.0+ installed
- [ ] I started and quit GIMP at least once before installing PhotoGIMP
- [ ] I extracted/copied files to the correct directory
- [ ] I checked the Troubleshooting section in the README

## Additional Information
<!-- Location of GIMP config folder on your system (if you found it) -->
- Config folder location: 

<!-- For Windows users: -->
- Did you press Windows+R and navigate to `%APPDATA%\GIMP`? 
- Did you see the `3.0` folder there? 

<!-- For Linux users: -->
- Are you using Flatpak or native GIMP? 
- Config folder checked: `~/.config/GIMP/3.0/` or `~/.var/app/org.gimp.GIMP/config/GIMP/3.0/`?

<!-- For macOS users: -->
- Did you navigate to `~/Library/Application Support/GIMP/3.0/`?
